src:
Virtus i dalje perfektan u Italiji, Teodosić i Marković prepustili posao drugima
Srpski košarkaši bez preterano zapaženog učinka protiv Ređijane

03 Nov 2019

Doživeo je Virtus onaj jedan poraz u Evrokupu protiv Promiteasa, ali u italijanskom šampionatu izgleda da mu nema ravnog. Danas je na crtu stala veoma kvalitetna i motivisana ekipa Ređijane, tek i ona je zaustavljena na svega 59 postignutih poena. Sastav Aleksandra Đorđevića je tako upisao sedmu pobedu u Italiji - 59:79.
Srpski košarkaši danas nisu imali zapažen poenterski učinak. I dok Stefan Marković nije postigao nijedan poen, već je meč završio sa šest skokova i osam asistencija na svom kontru, Miloš Teodosić se „popravio“ u drugom poluvremenu u kojem je ubacio osam poena.
Od samog starta utakmice, Virtus je počeo da diktira tempo i videlo se da će Ređijana teško uspeti da ga isprati. Rešetali su koš domaćina redom Vims, Gejns i Hanter, kasnije su im se priključili Delija i Riči, pa je već do poluvremena na semaforu pisalo devet razlike za crno-bele - 31:40.
Pokušala je Ređijana da se vrati početkom treće deonice, ali je umesto toga dobila pravi „šamar“, pošto je Virtus uzvratio serijom 11:0, otišao na 18 poena prednosti i tako naglasio domaćima da od pobede jednostavno nema ništa.
Tim Aleksandra Đorđevića je navedenu prednost samo održao, pa čak i nadogradio tokom četvrte deonice i na kraju je uspeo da slavi sasvim zasluženu pobedu. Tim iz Bolonje se sada okreće obavezama u Evrokupu gde će u sredu igrati protiv Ulma na domaćem terenu.
Na ovom meču, najefikasniji u ekipi Virtusa bio je Vins Hanter sa 16 poena, koliko je imao i Frenk Gejns. U Ređijani se istakao Džonson sa 20 poena.

ITALIJA 1 - 7. KOLO

SubotaDinamo Sasari - Virtus Roma 108:72
NedeljaBrindizi - Venecija 75:71Ređijana - Virtus 59:79Olimpija Milano - Vareze 93:69Pistoja - Trst 76:72Trevizo - Pesaro 85:75Fortitudo Bolonja - Breša /u toku/21.00: Kremona - Kantu

text:
Virtus still perfect in Italy, Teodosic and Markovic left work to others
Serbian basketball players with no over-the-top performance against Regiana

03 Nov 2019

Virtus experienced that one defeat in Eurocup against Promiteas, but in the Italian championship, he seems out of place. Today, a very high quality and motivated team of Regiana stood on the line, only stopping at only 59 points. Alexander Djordjevic's squad thus registered their seventh victory in Italy - 59-79.
Serbian basketball players today did not have a noticeable scoring effect. And while Stefan Markovic scored not one point but finished the match with six rebounds and eight assists on his own counter, Milos Teodosic improved in the second half, in which he scored eight points.
From the very start of the game, Virtus began to dictate the pace and it was obvious that Regian would have a hard time clearing it. They graced the hosts basket in the order of Wims, Gaines and Hunter, later joined by Delia and Richie, and by halftime there were nine differences for the black and whites - 31:40.
She tried to get Regian back at the start of the third leg, but instead got a real slap, as Virtus returned 11-0 with a series of 18 points and emphasized to the home team that there was simply nothing to win.
Alexander Djordjevic's team only maintained that advantage and even upgraded it during the fourth leg and finally managed to celebrate the well deserved victory. The Bologna team is now turning to commitments at Eurocup, where they will play against Ulm on home soil on Wednesday.
In this match, Vince Hunter was the most efficient on Virtus' team with 16 points, as did Frank Gains. Johnson scored 20 points in Reggiana.

ITALY 1 - 7TH ROUND

SaturdayDinamo Sasari - Virtus Roma 108: 72
SundayBrindisi - Venice 75: 71Regian - Virtus 59: 79Olympic Milan - Varese 93: 69Pistoia - Trieste 76: 72Trevizo - Pesaro 85: 75Fortitude Bologna - Brescia / ongoing / 21.00: Cremona - Kantu
